languages.text: "Где заниматься делами, как не на Футфоле, верно? Только делами Футфол и держится — нет места лучше для сделок, иначе бы этот плавильный котел давно бы растащили по астероиду".

traits.locale_text: "Где заниматься делами, как не на Футфоле, верно? Только делами Футфол и держится — нет места лучше для сделок, иначе бы этот плавильный котел давно бы растащили по астероиду".

languages.text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."
languages.original_text: "Где заниматься делами, как не на Футфоле, верно? Только делами Футфол и держится — нет места лучше для сделок, иначе бы этот плавильный котел давно бы растащили по астероиду".

traits.locale_text: "Where else to do business if not on Footfall, am I right? Business is Footfall's only livelihood — this is the place to make deals, otherwise they would've long stripped this melting pot, one asteroid at a time."

"Where else to do business if not on Footfall, am I right? Business is Footfall's only livelihood — this is the place to make deals, otherwise they would've long stripped this melting pot, one asteroid at a time."

"Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

"Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

"Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

languages.text: “哪里还有比落脚港更适合做生意的地方，是吧？这个大熔炉之所以还能运作，就是因为还有生意。如果这里不适合做生意，那落脚港恐怕会失去一颗又一颗的小行星，早就被剥个干净了。”
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: “哪里还有比落脚港更适合做生意的地方，是吧？这个大熔炉之所以还能运作，就是因为还有生意。如果这里不适合做生意，那落脚港恐怕会失去一颗又一颗的小行星，早就被剥个干净了。”

languages.text: «¿Qué mejor lugar que Paso para hacer negocios? Es lo único que da vida a este infierno. Si Paso no fuera el lugar idóneo en el que comerciar, hace tiempo que se habría desmantelado, asteroide a asteroide».
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué mejor lugar que Paso para hacer negocios? Es lo único que da vida a este infierno. Si Paso no fuera el lugar idóneo en el que comerciar, hace tiempo que se habría desmantelado, asteroide a asteroide».

languages.text: 「フットフォールほど仕事がしやすい場所もそうそうない。仕事があるおかげでこの掃き溜めみたいな場所が保たれてるようなもんだよ。もしここが取引をするのに最適な場所じゃなかったら、フットフォールはとっくの昔に小惑星をひとつずつ剥ぎ取られて、歴史から消されていただろうね」
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールほど仕事がしやすい場所もそうそうない。仕事があるおかげでこの掃き溜めみたいな場所が保たれてるようなもんだよ。もしここが取引をするのに最適な場所じゃなかったら、フットフォールはとっくの昔に小惑星をひとつずつ剥ぎ取られて、歴史から消されていただろうね」

languages.text: "Und wo könnte man besser Geschäfte machen als auf Footfall, habe ich recht? Geschäfte sind das Einzige, was diesen Schmelztiegel am Laufen hält. Wäre Footfall nicht der beste Ort für Geschäfte, wäre es längst geplündert worden, ein Asteroid nach dem anderen."
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: "Und wo könnte man besser Geschäfte machen als auf Footfall, habe ich recht? Geschäfte sind das Einzige, was diesen Schmelztiegel am Laufen hält. Wäre Footfall nicht der beste Ort für Geschäfte, wäre es längst geplündert worden, ein Asteroid nach dem anderen."

languages.text: « Et y a pas mieux que Castel pour ça, pas vrai ? Sans les affaires, cet endroit tomberait en ruines. À vrai dire, si cette station n'était pas idéale pour conclure des marchés, elle se serait fait dépouiller depuis longtemps, un astéroïde après l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: « Et y a pas mieux que Castel pour ça, pas vrai ? Sans les affaires, cet endroit tomberait en ruines. À vrai dire, si cette station n'était pas idéale pour conclure des marchés, elle se serait fait dépouiller depuis longtemps, un astéroïde après l'autre. »

languages.text: "İş yapmak için Binliman'dan iyisi yok, haksız mıyım? Bu kozmopolit batağın çarkları da o sayede dönüyor zaten. Anlaşma yapmak için daha uygun bir yer olsaydı Binliman'ı otuz kere soyup soğana çevirmişlerdi, asteroitlerin parçası bile kalmazdı."
languages.original_text: "Where better to do business than Footfall, am I right? Business is the only thing keeping this melting pot going. If this wasn't the best place to make deals, Footfall would've been stripped clean long before now, one asteroid at a time."

traits.locale_text: "İş yapmak için Binliman'dan iyisi yok zaten, haksız mıyım? İşte bu sayede burası herkesin ekmek teknesi olmuş. Burası anlaşmalar için ideal olmasaydı, Binliman'ı çoktan soyup soğana çevirirlerdi, bir tane bile asteroit kalmazdı."
